name: Wizard Tower (Jen // Paladin Ink)
description:
In a world where wizards can only shoot horizontally...

Under siege from a deluge of robotic foes, four wizards must work together to protect their precious tower. Band together with three of your friends and learn the power of wizard stacking, part of a mystical art known as physical activity.

Requires at least 3 controllers in order to play.

Controller bindings:

A :  Selection

Left-Stick:   Movement

Right-Stick:  Aim

Left-Trigger:  Pick up

Right-Trigger:   Shoot

Keyboard and Mouse bindings:

WASD:  Movement

Mouse: Aim

E: Pick Up

Left Click: Shoot 

Created by:

Nick Greenbaum - Level Design, 3D Art & Animation
Zhi Yu Han - Programmer, Designer
Trinity Parcero - Art, Graphic Design
Jennifer Siino - Producer, ProgrammerChase Taylor - Programmer, Designer
Gian-Paolo von Ruden - Sound Designer, UI Art
